coded_answer.p: Yesterday I went to "The Circle Theatre" to see the musical show "OVER THE RAINBOW". I'm very disappointed ofwith this evening. The first thing was, that it started 45 minutes late. And when it finalyfinally started, thereit wasn't Danny Brook who plaiedplayedperformed. There was a different actor and he was really bad. You should have informed us before that you'veyou'd changed the actor. On the advertisement you wrote that discounts are available but they weren't. After the show I wanted to drink somthingsomething in your theatre restaurant but when I arrived it was closed because the show started totoo late! I'm so disappointed! I wanted to have a pleasant evening while I'm here in London for a week's holiday. So I ask you sincearlysincerely for my money back becausbecause it wasn't a perfect evening out.

Unfortunately, Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets. I told her that my parents are getting divorseddivorced and that I will move to Chicago with my mother. We are together in High Schoolin High School together in California and this is our last year. We wanted to study biology here in Los Angeles with some other friends but now my plans have changed and I have to leave them.

One day, Pat and I were going home, when she asked me, if I willwould give a party beforbefore I'llI go. I had to tell her that I don'tdidn't have the time to organise anything becausbecause we, my mother and I, havehad to get our stuff ready to move. She wasn't very surprised and soon I'veI'd forgotten her question. The year was gettingcoming to thean end. On Monday in our last week Pat asked me if I wantwanted to eat supper at her house. I thought it was a good idea and we went home. But when we getgot into the houshouse therthere were all my friends! We had a great evening becausbecause Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets!
